narratives: Now that you have grains, you can sell them for some extra gold.
The action [do sellGrain] sells ALL your grains in your inventory.
Hint (you can only buy or sell items at the market)~
feedback: Firstly you have to travel to the market using [do gotoMarket]
At the market, you are able to sell all of your grains using [do sellGrain]
objective: Sell your grain at the market to get money
hint: you can only buy or sell items at the market
